sentences.en: Aerodynamic ( passive ) instability is a disadvantage for manned vehicles.
sentences.cn: 气动力 ( 被动 ) 稳定对于载人飞行器是不利的.

sentences.en: Aerodynamic balances are simpler and lighter than mass balances or power boost.
sentences.cn: 气动补偿比重量补偿或助力器简单而且轻便.

sentences.en: Aerodynamic forces and moments are strictly speaking functionals of the state variables.
sentences.cn: 严格说来,气动力和力矩是状态变量的泛涵.

sentences.en: An effective aerodynamic optimization design method of transonic airfoil is given.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种有效的跨音速翼型气动优化设计方法.

sentences.en: Moreover, addition movement of the airframe can result from aerodynamic or propulsion noise.
sentences.cn: 此外气动力或发动机扰动也会造成弹体的附加运动.

sentences.en: The aerodynamic forces on any control surface produce a moment about the hinge.
sentences.cn: 在任何操纵面上的空气动力均产生围绕其铰链轴的力矩.

sentences.en: The frequency response function includes an aerodynamic transfer function.
sentences.cn: 频率的主函数包括主动力传递函数.

sentences.en: The linear scaling and the Reynolds number represent classical, aerodynamic similitude requirements applicable to law - speed flight.
sentences.cn: 线性缩尺和雷诺数是低速飞行时经典的气动力模似要求.

sentences.en: The mechanism of reducing aerodynamic drag by acoustic excitation was briefly analysed.
sentences.cn: 本文首先简要地分析了声激励减阻机理.

sentences.en: The newspaperman summarized the crux of the aerodynamic phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 记者总结了空气动力现象之谜.

sentences.en: The secret of the machine lies in the aerodynamic shape of the frame.
sentences.cn: 该机器的精妙之处在于其构架呈流线型。

sentences.en: There is, as with aerodynamic control additional complication if roll control is required.
sentences.cn: 像用气动力控制那样,如果需要滚动控制,那么就增加了复杂性.

sentences.en: These effects appear to be negligible with respect to aerodynamic coefficients.
sentences.cn: 就空气动力系数这方面来说,这些影响似乎可以略去.

sentences.en: Various aerodynamic devices, as well as passive dampers and serve dampers, are available.
sentences.cn: 各种空气动力装置以及无源阻尼器和伺服阻尼器是可用的.

sentences.en: While files on the aerodynamic research are not systemic in the country.
sentences.cn: 对于建筑物动态风力的研究,在国内还不系统.

words.tran_cn: 高空牙痛症；[特医] 航空性牙痛
[流] 气体力学；[航] 航空动力学

phrases.tran_cn: 气动特性；空气动力特性；风轮空气动力特性
气动载荷；空气动力载荷

trans.tran_en: an aerodynamic car, design etc uses the principles of aerodynamics to achieve high speed or low use of petrol
